## Cluster: `r colorize(params$cluster,"red")`

## Genesets Ridges
```{r Ridges_Genesets, out.width="100%", echo=FALSE}
flist <- list.files(
        params$report_plots_folder_png,
        pattern = paste0("Genesets_ridges_.*-", params$cluster, "*"),
        full.names = T
)
knitr::include_graphics(flist)
```
